Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller

Klasse Controller_main

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.controller.Controller_main
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ProfileAware
public class Controller_main extends Object implements ProfileAware
Controller for the main application view. Manages navigation between different views and handles global application settings.

      public void setWebAPI(com.jpro.webapi.WebAPI webAPI)
